name: Rock, Paper, Geometry!
description:
Originally created for Mini LD 44 in 2013: http://ludumdare.com/compo/minild-44/?action=preview&uid=24628

What is it

"Rock, Paper, Geometry!" - is a real-time tactic game based on "rock, paper, scissors" rules with random generated levels and impulse movement.

How to play

Your team is blue. Red team is your enemy. You must destroy them using "rock, paper, scissors" rules: Triangle is scissors, square is paper, circle is rock!

Controls
  • Left click on a unit - Select a unit
  • Right click on the map - Give the unit an impulse towards the click point
  • R - Restart the game
